item.title: ファイリングしている：E・ジーン・キャロル、ドナルド・トランプに対する2019年の名誉毀損訴訟の修正を求め、CNNのタウンホールでの発言に対する追加賠償を求める（Benjamin Weiser/New York Times)
item.description:
Benjamin Weiser / New York Times:
Filing: E. Jean Carroll asks to amend her 2019 defamation lawsuit against Donald Trump, seeking additional damages for comments he made during CNN's town hall  —  The former president's repeated denials that he sexually abused Ms. Carroll “show the depth of his malice” and merit heavy damages, her lawyer wrote.

item.title: TegnaがStandard Generalによる買収の契約を終了したと発表、Standard Generalは2022年の早い時期に約8.6Bドルの取引でTegnaを買収することで合意した（Matthew Keys/The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Tegna says its deal to be acquired by Standard General is terminated; Standard General agreed to acquire Tegna early in 2022 in a deal valued at around $8.6B  —  Television broadcaster TEGNA says its pending deal to be acquired by Standard General is officially dead.

item.title: パラマウントは、米国で6月27日に「Paramount+ with Showtime」サービスを月額11.99ドルで開始予定、ShowtimeなしのParamount+は5.99ドル（ピーター・ホワイト/Deadline）。
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Paramount plans to launch its Paramount+ with Showtime service in the US on June 27 for $11.99 per month; Paramount+ without Showtime will cost $5.99  —  Paramount has confirmed the launch plans, including date, for the merged Paramount+ with Showtime service.  —  The company will launch the rebranded bundle on June 27.

item.title: TikTok、アプリを禁止する新法についてモンタナ州を提訴 修正第1条、国家安全保障問題に対する州の権限不足などを理由に（Bobby Allyn/NPR）
item.description:
Bobby Allyn / NPR:
TikTok sues Montana over its new law banning the app, citing the First Amendment, the state's lack of authority on national security issues, and more  —  TikTok has filed a federal lawsuit against Montana after the state passed a law last week intended to ban the app from being downloaded within its borders.

item.title: 最高裁の報道陣をアンタッチャブルな存在として取り上げ、倫理観の欠如などの問題を無視する批判と、そのビートを改善するための提案（Dahlia Lithwick/Slate)
item.description:
Dahlia Lithwick / Slate:
A critique of the Supreme Court press corps, which covers the justices as untouchable, ignoring issues like ethical lapses, and suggestions to improve the beat  —  This is a part of Disorder in the Court, a weeklong series on the legal press and the most explosive Supreme Court in generations …

item.title: ブルーチェックのツイッターアカウントの中には、ブルームバーグになりすましたものもあり、AIが生成したペンタゴンの爆発画像を拡散、株式市場は一時的に下落した（Chloe Xiang/VICE）
item.description:
Chloe Xiang / VICE:
Some blue-check Twitter accounts, one pretending to be Bloomberg, spread an AI-generated image of an explosion at the Pentagon; the stock market briefly dipped  —  An AI-generated image of a fake explosion near the Pentagon went viral thanks to blue-check Twitter accounts.  —  Chloe Xiang

item.title: バイデンは、ベテラン政府弁護士のアンナ・ゴメスをFCC委員に指名し、民主党のジェフリー・スタークスと共和党のブレンダン・カーをFCCの新任務に指名する（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Biden nominates veteran government lawyer Anna Gomez as FCC Commissioner, and nominates Democrat Geoffrey Starks and Republican Brendan Carr for new FCC terms  —  The White House also nominated Democrat Geoffrey Starks and Republican Brendan Carr for new terms on the Commission.

item.title: CinedigmがCineverseとしてリブランディングし、昨年秋に開始したその名の通りのストリーミングサービスは、22K以上のタイトルを持つ世界第6位のストリーマーだと言う（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Cinedigm rebrands as Cineverse, and says its namesake streaming service that launched last fall is the sixth-largest streamer globally with its 22K+ titles  —  EXCLUSIVE: As its stock price continues to languish, Cinedigm is following through on its stated plan to rebrand the company …

item.title: 情報筋の話：Politico, The New York Times, and other outlets plan to sit out the GOP presidential primary debates due to the cost and potential for brand damage (Max Tani/Semafor).
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Sources: Politico, The New York Times, and other outlets plan to sit out the GOP presidential primary debates due to the cost and the potential for brand damage  —  The Scoop  —  Some major media outlets have decided to sit out the Republican presidential primary debates.

item.title: ジェフ・シェルが解雇された後、NBCUを引き継いだコムキャスト社長マイク・カヴァナーのプロフィール。リンダ・ヤッカリーノの退社、作家のストライキなどに対処している（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
A profile of Comcast president Mike Cavanagh, who took over NBCU after Jeff Shell was fired, as he deals with Linda Yaccarino's exit, writers' strike, and more  —  Mike Cavanagh, a veteran of the financial crisis, has just been given a leading part in the unending drama of Hollywood.

item.title: 情報筋の話：ESPNのDTCストリーミングサービスはESPN+のような独立した製品になるが、ESPNのすべての番組が含まれ、2025年または2026年に開始されるようだ（Andrew Marchand/New York Post）。
item.description:
Andrew Marchand / New York Post:
Sources: ESPN's DTC streaming service will be a standalone product like ESPN+ but will include all of ESPN's programming and is likely to launch in 2025 or 2026  —  Get plugged in on the latest in sports media  —  In Sept. 2021, we debuted this newsletter with a deep dive about how ESPN …

item.title: 英国のリーチは、80以上のオンラインブランドで毎日公開される数千の記事を集約するAI搭載のウェブサイト「My News Assistant」をベータテストしている（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The UK's Reach is beta testing My News Assistant, an AI-powered website that aggregates the thousands of articles published daily across its 80+ online brands  —  My News Assistant is currently in beta testing.  —  Reach is testing an AI-powered website that brings together stories …

item.title: テキサス州ユバルデの学校での大虐殺を取材したCNNのシモン・プロクペッツのインタビュー、警察からシカトされたこと、被害者家族と話したことなど（Charlotte Klein/Vanity Fair）．
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
An interview with CNN's Shimon Prokupecz on covering the Uvalde, Texas school massacre, being stonewalled by the police, speaking to victims' families, and more  —  Nearly a year since the Texas school massacre, and ahead of a network special, the CNN correspondent addresses journalistic challenges …

item.title: 情報筋：Never Back DownスーパーPACは、知事が戦闘的な運営を自負しているにもかかわらず、Ron DeSantisを取材する記者にもっとアクセスさせようと動いている（Max Tani/Semafor)
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Sources: the Never Back Down super PAC is working to give reporters covering Ron DeSantis more access, despite the governor's pride in his combative operation  —  The News  —  The presidential campaign-in-waiting and super PAC supporting Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis are trying to warm …

item.title: WGAは状況判断を誤り、組合の弱体化で終わった1980年代の英国炭鉱労働者のストライキと同様に、損なわれた状態でストライキを抜けることになる（Scott Galloway/No Mercy/No Malice）。
item.description:
Scott Galloway / No Mercy / No Malice:
The WGA incorrectly assessed the situation and will exit the strike impaired, similar to the British coal miners' 1980s strike that ended with a weakened union  —  Forty years ago, 190,000 British coal miners went on strike.  The U.K. government, which owned the mines, met none of the strikers' demands.
